EXAMPLE THM
HYPOTHESES: 
POINT A B C D E F G
ISO_TRIANGLE C A B
S_ANGLE B A D 30
ON_BLINE D C B
INTERSECTION_LL E A B C D
SYM F E A D
ON_PLINE G D D B
ON_LINE G A F
SHOW: EQDISTANCE D G D E

F(294.945720437935850+7,479.188017343447400-24)  G(281.882519801967250+7,456.561890132483650-24)
